timestamp.description: The date+timestamp which identifies the point in time, where the information was generated, including milliseconds.

description: Contains an array of fill levels.

processPoint.description: The location where the information was generated. (Siehe Anlagen Bezeichnungskonzept)

total.description: Number of parcels actually at the processpoint (Sorter / Conveyor).

capacity.description: Maximum number of parcels the processpoint (Sorter / Conveyor) can buffer. xy

noDestination.description: Number of parcels with no destination.

destinationMCS.description: Number of parcels with destination MCS.

destinationReject.description: Number of parcels with destination reject.

FillLevel.description: The actual fill level of the parcel sorter. The fill level will be used for visualization and control purposes.
